title: Kabul Serena Hotel
description:
Featuring free WiFi, a restaurant and a barbecue, Kabul Serena Hotel offers accommodations in Kabul Free private parking is available on site.


Rooms have a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms have a seating area where you can relax. The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries.


There is a 24-hour front desk, gift shop, and shops at the property.


The hotel also offers car hire.
address: Kabul Serena Hotel, Froshgah Street, Kabul, Afghanistan, 1001 Kabul, Afghanistan

title: Hotel InterContinental Kabul
description:
Located in Kabul, a 17-minute walk from Qal‘eh-ye Ghavvāş Barakī, Hotel InterContinental Kabul provides accommodations with a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness center. Each room at the 5-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a garden and to a tennis court. The property has a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.


At the hotel all rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a desk, a patio with a pool view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. Each room has a safety deposit box, while some rooms come with a balcony and others also have garden views. All guest rooms will provide guests with a closet and an electric tea pot.


Hotel InterContinental Kabul offers a continental or buffet breakfast.


Guests can enjoy the spa and wellness center, organise trips at the tour desk, or rent a car to explore the surroundings.


The accommodation provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying.


Qal‘eh-ye Ghawās Barakī is a 17-minute walk from Hotel InterContinental Kabul, while Kolōtapushta is 1.7 miles away. The nearest airport is Hamid Karzai International, 6.8 miles from the hotel, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service.

title: Golden Star Hotel & Restaurant
description:
Located in Kabul, a 4-minute walk from Deh Sabz, Golden Star Hotel & Restaurant provides accommodations with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The property has a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.


All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with an electric tea pot. Every room includes air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, and some units at Golden Star Hotel & Restaurant have a city view. At the accommodation rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.


Guests at Golden Star Hotel & Restaurant can enjoy a continental breakfast.


Shahr-e Now is a 4-minute walk from the hotel, while Shīrpūr is 0.6 miles away. The nearest airport is Hamid Karzai International, 3.7 miles from Golden Star Hotel & Restaurant, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
address: Shahr-e-Naw Haji Yaqoob Square, Sulh Rd, 1003 Kabul, Afghanistan

title: Kabul Star Hotel & Restaurant
description:

sign in
.


Located in Shīrpūr, a 7-minute walk from Kabul, Kabul Star Hotel & Restaurant has accommodations with a restaurant, free private parking, a fitness center and a garden. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with an outdoor pool. The property provides a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.


At the hotel the rooms come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, bathrobes and slippers. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while some rooms also feature a balcony. All rooms feature a desk.


Guests at Kabul Star Hotel & Restaurant can enjoy a continental breakfast.


The accommodation has a sun terrace.


Shahr-e Now is a 12-minute walk from Kabul Star Hotel & Restaurant, while Deh Sabz is 0.7 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Hamid Karzai International, 3.1 miles from the hotel, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service.
address: Zanbaq Squarem Square, Ankara Street, Opposite of Turkish Embassy, Shīrpūr, Afghanistan
